title: Translate Into System
text: Letting $$x=number$$ of adult tickets sold and $$y=number$$ of child tickets sold: $$x+y=553$$, $$9x+6y=3936$$

title: Eliminating One Variable
text: Let's eliminate $$y$$ so that we can solve for $$x$$. Multiply the first equation by $$-6$$ and then add. $$3x=618$$
speech: Let's eliminate  y  so that we can solve for  x . Multiply the first equation by  negative 6  and then add.  3 x is equal to 618

title: Solving the Equation
speech: x is equal to 618 over 3, is equal to, 206 .  206  adult tickets were sold.
